org.mitre.uma.service

接口 PermissionService


  • public interface PermissionService
    作者:
    jricher

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      PermissionTicket createTicket(ResourceSet resourceSet, Set<String> scopes) 
      PermissionTicket getByTicket(String ticket)
      Read the permission associated with the given ticket.
      PermissionTicket updateTicket(PermissionTicket ticket)
      Save the updated permission ticket to the database.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createTicket

        PermissionTicket createTicket(ResourceSet resourceSet,
                              Set<String> scopes)
        参数:
        resourceSet - the resource set to create the permission on
        scopes - the set of scopes that this permission is for
        返回:
        the created (and stored) permission object, with ticket
        抛出:
        org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.exceptions.InsufficientScopeException - if the scopes in scopes don't match those in resourceSet.getScopes

      • getByTicket

        PermissionTicket getByTicket(String ticket)
        Read the permission associated with the given ticket.
        参数:
        the - ticket value to search on
        返回:
        the permission object, or null if none is found

      • updateTicket

        PermissionTicket updateTicket(PermissionTicket ticket)
        Save the updated permission ticket to the database. Does not create a new ticket.
        参数:
        ticket -
        返回:
